sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Pool = () => { return (

Lottery Pools

Choose the lottery pool that appropriate your strategy.

LUCKSTARK offers you 3 pools of 10 minutes, 1 hour and 1 day, after these periods, a person is randomly selected and 95% of that money is automatically sent to the selected person.

10 Minutes

2317$/Current Pool

Every 10 minutes, the coins in the pool are sent to one person.

1 Hour

14339$/Current Pool

Every one hour, the coins in the pool are sent to one person.

1 Day

49791$/Current Pool

Every day, the coins in the pool are sent to one person.

) } export default Pool
